Author: bakeahri
Text: We don’t really have a word for it. We would just say “special diet for medical reasons.” And of course there are words for specific conditions such as celiac disease (no gluten) and lactose-intolerance (no dairy)

Author: Tertiaritus
Text: You can tell them you're on a medical diet (dunno what's it called in English) because of digestion issues and, while you appreciate the thought and offer, you just have to decline or your digestion will be badly sabotaged for days  Works like a charm
